pr_title: Issue 13577: JWE consumer support initial drop

timeline.message:
Issue 13577: JWE consumer support initial drop

For issue #13577

Adds support for server.xml configuration attributes that allow consuming of JWE tokens.

timeline.bodyText:
Please confirm if the key value is traced, if so, then tag this method and elsewhere this key is visible in this path with

@Sensitive
timeline.author: teddyjtorres

timeline.message: Issue 13577: Add doPriv in JWT consumer and Sensitive annotation for JWE decrypt keys
Issue 13577: Add doPriv in JWT consumer and Sensitive annotation for JWE decrypt keys
